HomePage.title: EduPrompt - AI-Powered Education Platform
HomePage.description: Transform your teaching with AI-powered prompts and educational tools

Hero.continueJourney: Continue your journey with AI-powered teaching tools. Access your saved prompts, create new ones, and discover fresh ideas for your classroom.
Hero.streamline: Streamline your lesson planning with our intelligent prompt management system. Create, share, and personalize AI prompts tailored to your teaching style and curriculum.

Features.title: Everything You Need to Enhance Teaching
Features.subtitle: Discover powerful features designed specifically for high school educators
Features.repositoryDesc: Access thousands of categorized prompts organized by subject, grade level, and teaching objectives.
Features.personalizationDesc: AI adapts prompts to match your unique teaching style, subject expertise, and classroom needs.
Features.collaborationDesc: Share, rate, and collaborate on prompts with fellow educators in your school and beyond.
Features.suggestionsDesc: Get intelligent recommendations based on your teaching patterns and curriculum requirements.
Features.accessDesc: Secure permissions system for teachers, administrators, and system managers.
Features.crossPlatformDesc: Access your prompts anywhere with our responsive web platform and mobile app.

Pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
Pricing.subtitle: Flexible pricing options for individual teachers and schools

features.schoolNoQuota: Free of action, testing & optimization quotas
features.schoolSharedPool: Usage counts toward school token pool

CTA.title: Ready to Transform Your Teaching?
CTA.subtitle: Join thousands of educators already using EduPrompt to create more engaging and effective lessons.

Create.title: Create New Prompt
Create.promptDescriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of what this prompt does
Create.instructionMinLength: Instruction must be at least 20 characters long.
Create.collectionNameRequired: Please enter a name for your new collection.
Create.fileSizeLimit: File size must be less than 10MB
Create.clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop
Create.fileSupport: PDF, DOC, TXT, JPG, PNG up to 10MB
Create.templatesSubtitle: Choose a template to get started
Create.promptReviewSubtitle: This shows how your complete prompt will be structured
Create.noResultsYet: Run a test to see results here
Create.instructionPlaceholder: Detailed instructions for the AI model
Create.wizardInstructionApplied: Optimization advice applied. Click 'Optimize' to use it.

LessonPlan.title: 1-Period Lesson Plan
LessonPlan.description: Create a detailed lesson plan with objectives, activities, and assessment methods.
LessonPlan.instruction: Create a 1-period lesson plan for a high school lesson based on teacher input, describing objectives, student activities, teacher role, teaching methods, and in-class assessment.
LessonPlan.inputExample: Lesson: The Great Gatsby, Grade: 11, Duration: 45 mis. Priority: Group discussion.
LessonPlan.outputFormat: Detailed plan with objectives, materials, procedure (4 activities), and assessment.
LessonPlan.constraints: Feasible with classroom conditions, reasonable timing.

WarmUp.title: Warm-Up Activity Design
WarmUp.description: Design engaging warm-up activities to start the class.
WarmUp.instruction: Design 1–2 warm-up activities to attract attention, connect old and new knowledge, and introduce the main content.
WarmUp.inputExample: Lesson: Newton's Laws, Grade: 10, Trait: Energetic. Want a game.
WarmUp.outputFormat: Activity name, objective, preparation, procedure steps.

ConceptFormation.title: Guided Discovery Questions
ConceptFormation.description: Build a sequence of questions to guide students in discovering new concepts.
ConceptFormation.instruction: Design a sequence of guided questions from easy to difficult, helping students self-discover and form new knowledge.
ConceptFormation.inputExample: Concept: Functions, Grade: 10. Want differentiated questions.
ConceptFormation.outputFormat: Numbered list of questions with purpose notes.
ConceptFormation.constraints: Don't reveal definition immediately, age-appropriate language.

Practice.title: Differentiated Practice Exercises
Practice.description: Create practice exercises with basic, applied, and advanced levels.
Practice.instruction: Create a set of practice exercises for in-class use, differentiated (basic – applied – advanced).
Practice.outputFormat: Groups A, B, C with assignment suggestions and answers.
Practice.constraints: Aligned with lesson content, fits time limit.

ApplicationHomework.title: Application & Homework
ApplicationHomework.description: Design real-world application activities and appropriate homework.
ApplicationHomework.instruction: Design a short in-class application activity and propose specific homework.
ApplicationHomework.context: End of class and home study.
ApplicationHomework.inputExample: Lesson: Modern Poetry, 5 mins left. Homework: Moderate.

ReviewLesson.title: Pre-Exam Review Lesson
ReviewLesson.description: Plan a review lesson to systematize knowledge and practice exam types.
ReviewLesson.instruction: Design a review lesson before an exam to systematize knowledge and practice common question types.
ReviewLesson.inputExample: Review Vectors, upcoming 1-period multiple choice test.
ReviewLesson.outputFormat: Objectives, Knowledge Systematization, Practice Section, Self-study Guide.
ReviewLesson.constraints: Focus on exam format, avoid cramming.

TechIntegration.title: Tech Integration Script
TechIntegration.description: Guide on using specific tech tools in a lesson.
TechIntegration.instruction: Create a script for using technology (slides, software, quiz...) in a specific lesson.
TechIntegration.inputExample: Use Quizizz for History Grade 12, end of class check.
TechIntegration.outputFormat: Tool description, role, placement, detailed script.
TechIntegration.constraints: Fits available devices, tech serves learning goals.

Wizard.title: Optimization Suggestions
Wizard.subtitle: Answer a few questions to help AI create the best prompt for you.

Search.choosePromptHint: Choose a prompt from your library to test and compare.
Search.temperatureTooltip: Controls randomness. Lower (0.1-0.3) = more focused. Higher (0.7-1.0) = more creative.
Search.topPTooltip: Controls diversity. Lower = predictable. Higher = diverse.

OptimizationPanel.title: AI Optimization
OptimizationPanel.description: Enhance your prompt using AI. Select a model and provide specific instructions on how you want to improve it.
OptimizationPanel.instructionsPlaceholder: e.g., Make it more concise, add more examples, fix grammar...
